p: Aqueous solutions of three other polymers, polyvinylidene fluoride (PVDF, Alfa Aesar)/N-methyl pyrrolidinone (NMP, Xilong Chemical Co., Ltd.), polyvinyl alcohol (PVA-224, Aladdin, MW ~205,000), and polyethylene glycol (PEG, Aldrich, MW ~20,000), were prepared by dissolving their powders in DI water to obtain solutions containing 20 mg mL −1 polymer. PVDF and PEG are soluble at room temperature. The dissolution of PVA in DI water was at 90°C.
